testcase.classname: Registration | User could signup with a new account
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user click on register link...........................................passed When user fills personal details with valid data............................passed And user fills pass with valid data.........................................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then success message displayed..............................................passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could login to open their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user should go to login page..........................................passed When user login with valid "email@gmail.com" and "asdf@1234"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could login to open their accounts
testcase.name: User could reset his/her password successfully
